articles.title: Morrisey: Emissions rule is 'attack on rural America' - WV News
articles.description: CHARLESTON, W.Va. — West Virginia Attorney General Patrick Morrisey is calling the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency’s proposed new rule on car tailpipes as “unlawful and misguided,” and is urging the
